package.name: python_blmc
package.description:
The `blmc` package contains an API for the CAN interface of the motor control microcontroller of the Brushless Motor Control Project as well as the OptoForce sensor.
The scripts use this API for several tasks like evaluating the CAN interface, displaying motor parameters or running simple velocity/position controllers.
This only works with the *dual_motor_torque_ctrl* code running on the board.
package.author: Felix Widmaier
